verses.1: “Pasian in note hong mawhsak loh nadingin midangte va mawh saksak nawn kei un.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh midangteʼ thu na khen zia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen dinga, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi.
verses.3: Bang hangin na lawmteʼ mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk thei lo na hi hiam?
verses.4: Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam?
verses.5: No a kineihkhem mite aw, noteʼ mit sunga singluang tang la khia masa le-uhcin, na lawmte uh mit sunga ninthem tang na lakkhiat theih nadingun hoihtakin khua na mu thei pan ding uh hi.
verses.6: “Uite tungah a siangtho nate pia kei un. Pia le-uhcin hong pet zawsop ding hi. Vokte mai ah na suang manphate uh lot kei un. Lot le-uhcin sikcip lel ding uh hi.
verses.7: “Ngen un; na nget uh leh hong kipia ding hi. Zong un; na zon uh leh na mu ding uh hi. Kongkhak na kiu un; na kiuh uh leh hong kihon ding hi.
verses.8: Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh a ngente khempeuh in ngah ding uh a, a zongte khempeuh in mu ding uh a, a kiute khempeuh ading kong kihon ding hi.
verses.9: Pa ahi note khatpeuh in na tate un anlum hong ngen leh suangtum pia ding na hi uh hiam?
verses.10: Ngasa hong ngen leh gul pia ding na hi uh hiam?
verses.11: Note mihoih lo hi napi-in na tate uh tungah na hoih piak ding ngaihsun thei na hih uh leh vantungah a om na Pa un a ngen mite tungah na hoihte hong pia zaw mahmah ding hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.12: Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangteʼ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.
verses.13: “Kong kawcik bek tawnin lut un. Hell khuk tun nading kongvang pen lianin a lampi baih a, mi tampi in a zui uh hi.
verses.14: Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun nading kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zui zo uh hi.
verses.15: “Kamsang taktak ahi lote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungtham ah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sung tawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uh hi.
verses.16: Amauteʼ gamtatna tawh amauʼ pianzia na thei ding uh hi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngei a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?
verses.17: Tua ahih manin singkung cidamte in gah limci gah a, singkung gina lote in gah gina lo gah uh hi.
verses.18: Singkung cidamte in gah gina lo gah ngei lo a, singkung gina lote in gah limci gah ngei lo hi.
verses.19: Gah limci a gah lo singkungte kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul hi.
verses.20: Tua ahih manin amauʼ gamtatna tawh amauʼ pianzia na thei ding uh hi.
verses.21: “Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lut thei kim lo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Paʼ deihna bangin a gamta teng bek lut thei ding uh hi.
verses.22: Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawl khia-in, nangma min tawh nalamdang lian tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihem khia un,’ ka ci ding hi.
verses.24: “Ka thuhilhna za-in a zui mi khempeuhte pen suang tungah a inn a lam mipil pa tawh kibang ding hi.
verses.25: Guah hong zu-in, tui hong khangin, huihpi hong nung a, tua inn a nawk gawp uh hangin suang tungah kilam ahih manin kisia zo lo hi.
verses.26: Hih ka thugente za napi-in a zui nuam lote pen sehnel tungah a inn a lam mihai pa tawh kibang ding hi.
verses.27: Guah hong zu-in, tui hong khangin, huihpi hong nung a, tua inn a nawk gawp uh ciangin a kisia hi. Tua inn naksiat mahmah hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi.
verses.28: Jesu in hih a thugente a man khit ciangin, ama thugenna hangin mihonpite in lamdang sa mahmah uh hi.
verses.29: Amah in Thukham hilh siate bangin thu gen loin, aana neite bangin thu a gen zaw hi.
